## API Design (if applicable)
- Endpoint: `https://api.3plguys.com/v1/endpoint/path`
- Method: `GET/POST/PUT/DELETE`

### Request Example
```json
{
  "property": "value",
  "anotherProperty": 123
}
```

### Response Example
```json
{
  "id": "abc123",
  "status": "success",
  "data": {
  "property": "value"
}
}
```
